pre_text_caption_evidence: a valuation allowance totaling $ 45.4 million , $ 43.9 million and $ 40.4 million as of 2013 , 2012 and 2011 year end , respectively , has been established for deferred income tax assets primarily related to certain subsidiary loss carryforwards that may not be realized .
realization of the net deferred income tax assets is dependent on generating sufficient taxable income prior to their expiration .
although realization is not assured , management believes it is more- likely-than-not that the net deferred income tax assets will be realized .
the amount of the net deferred income tax assets considered realizable , however , could change in the near term if estimates of future taxable income during the carryforward period fluctuate .
the following is a reconciliation of the beginning and ending amounts of unrecognized tax benefits for 2013 , 2012 and ( amounts in millions ) 2013 2012 2011 .
original_metadata.question: what is the net change amount in the unrecognized tax benefits during 2012?
